long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension counts the lines of code (LOC) in the current GitHub repo on screen and  displays that at the top of the page. This extension only works on the top level page of the repo. That is, https://github.com/organization/repo-name/directory-name will show nothing, but https://github.com/organization/repo-name will show the total LOC for the entire repo.
